title: Gamer Girl looking for Girls to play with
body:
Hey guys ^-^ i'm a girl gamer who is looking for some fellow gamer girls to play some league of legends with :)

Just add me to your list and join our lobby, we have 3 gamer girls in the lobby already, trying to find a 5 woman group.

Cya guys on the rift :)

replies.body: Hey, if you haven't found enough yet I would be keen to reinstall the game and brush up on my skills. It would also just be cool if you girls played other games as well. Here is my discord name if you want to send me a PM. Atom#2802 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
